attributes.title: Survive Block Island: Meltdown | Official Trailer
attributes.caption: Trust no one but yourself! | Survive Block Island: Meltdown expands on the DRAMA and GAMESMANSHIP of an original ONLINE REALITY COMPETITION show. Book your trip and join our contestants on the island. The competition begins September 16, 2022!
attributes.description: Trust no one but yourself! | Survive Block Island: Meltdown expands on the DRAMA and GAMESMANSHIP of an original ONLINE REALITY COMPETITION show. Book your trip and join our contestants on the island. The competition begins September 16, 2022!
attributes.display_title: S2M:E0 - Survive Block Island: Meltdown | Official Trailer

attributes.title: Episode 1: Meeting Meltdown
attributes.caption: Twelve Competitors are introduced to Meltdown by host Trevor Collins who divides the group into two teams, Fire vs. Ice. The competitors familiarize themselves with their environments at basecamp while looking for allies before heading to the Puzzle Rush Challenge. The losing team must then face the Chopping Block, where the island claims its first victim.
attributes.description: Twelve Competitors are introduced to Meltdown by host Trevor Collins who divides the group into two teams, Fire vs. Ice. The competitors familiarize themselves with their environments at basecamp while looking for allies before heading to the Puzzle Rush Challenge. The losing team must then face the Chopping Block, where the island claims its first victim.

attributes.title: Episode 2: Pig Race Obstacle Course
attributes.caption: The 11 remaining competitors strategize amongst their respective teams before heading to the Pig Race Challenge.  The losing team must weigh social dynamics versus pig riding aptitude at the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: The 11 remaining competitors strategize amongst their respective teams before heading to the Pig Race Challenge.  The losing team must weigh social dynamics versus pig riding aptitude at the Chopping Block.
attributes.display_title: S2M:E2 - Episode 2: Pig Race Obstacle Course

attributes.title: Episode 3: Stick In A Box
attributes.caption: Brrrr! 10 Competitors advance to play a snowy variation on an Achievement Hunter classic, Snowbound. The losing team heads back to camp and strategizes on who should be eliminated. One unlucky competitor gets to test the temperatures of the core’s lava at the chopping block.
attributes.description: Brrrr! 10 Competitors advance to play a snowy variation on an Achievement Hunter classic, Snowbound. The losing team heads back to camp and strategizes on who should be eliminated. One unlucky competitor gets to test the temperatures of the core’s lava at the chopping block.
attributes.display_title: S2M:E3 - Episode 3: Stick In A Box

attributes.title: Episode 4: The Big Freeze
attributes.caption: Teams are switched up as 9 competitors move on to compete in the Buried Treasure Challenge. New alliances must be made before the losers head to the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: Teams are switched up as 9 competitors move on to compete in the Buried Treasure Challenge. New alliances must be made before the losers head to the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Episode 5: True-Blue
attributes.caption: It’s brains over brawn as 8 Competitors square off in the Temple Trivia challenge.  The losing team (aka the dumbest team) votes on who will take a dive into the lava at the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: It’s brains over brawn as 8 Competitors square off in the Temple Trivia challenge.  The losing team (aka the dumbest team) votes on who will take a dive into the lava at the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Episode 6: Green New Deal
attributes.caption: Things get shaken up yet again as everyone is merged into Team Earth! It’s stop and go as the 7 remaining Competitors test their MineCraft agility in the Red Light Green Challenge.  Only one from the Green Team can win the coveted Helmet of Kingdoms which provides safety from the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: Things get shaken up yet again as everyone is merged into Team Earth! It’s stop and go as the 7 remaining Competitors test their MineCraft agility in the Red Light Green Challenge.  Only one from the Green Team can win the coveted Helmet of Kingdoms which provides safety from the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Episode 7: Paranoia Will Destroy Ya
attributes.caption: The 6 remaining competitors must make big brain moves in the Memory Game for a chance at immunity from the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: The 6 remaining competitors must make big brain moves in the Memory Game for a chance at immunity from the Chopping Block.
attributes.display_title: S2M:E7 - Episode 7: Paranoia Will Destroy Ya

attributes.title: Episode 8: You Say it’s Your Birthday
attributes.caption: The last opportunity to play a totem weighs on the 5 remaining competitors as they are each thrown into The Escape Room challenge.  OG alliances are put to the ultimate test.
attributes.description: The last opportunity to play a totem weighs on the 5 remaining competitors as they are each thrown into The Escape Room challenge.  OG alliances are put to the ultimate test.
attributes.display_title: S2M:E8 - Episode 8: You Say it’s Your Birthday

attributes.title: Episode 9: It All Comes Down to Dis
attributes.caption: In the shocking season finale, the four remaining competitors face off in the Riddle Relay Challenge for the last opportunity to win the helmet of kingdoms and receive safety from the final Chopping Block. A jury of their peers then decides who among the 3 finalists should be crowned the champion of Survive Block Island Meltdown!
attributes.description: In the shocking season finale, the four remaining competitors face off in the Riddle Relay Challenge for the last opportunity to win the helmet of kingdoms and receive safety from the final Chopping Block. A jury of their peers then decides who among the 3 finalists should be crowned the champion of Survive Block Island Meltdown!
